com.github.joschi.jadconfig

  • Classes in com.github.joschi.jadconfig used by com.github.joschi.jadconfig 
    Class and Description
    Converter
    Interface for type converters.
    ConverterFactory
    Interface for converter factories A converter factory can be used to provider Converters for several types instead of using the Parameter.converter() annotation parameter for each class field.
    JadConfig
    The main class for JadConfig.
    Repository
    Interface for configuration repositories A configuration repository can be any data source containing configuration data, e. g. a simple in-memory store, a file, or a database.
    RepositoryException
    This exception indicates that an error occurred while using a Repository.
    TypeReference
    References a generic type.
    ValidationException
    This exception indicates that a configuration parameter's value couldn't be validated successfully by a Validator

  • Classes in com.github.joschi.jadconfig used by com.github.joschi.jadconfig.validators 
    Class and Description
    ValidationException
    This exception indicates that a configuration parameter's value couldn't be validated successfully by a Validator
    Validator
    Interface for parameter validators The validator will be called before any Converter has been run on the configuration parameter
